solution_line_template: With the new babies, there are {initial_caterpillars} + {new_eggs_hatch} = <<{initial_caterpillars}+{new_eggs_hatch}={caterpillars_after_hatch}>>{caterpillars_after_hatch} caterpillars.

With the big caterpillars leaving, there are {caterpillars_after_hatch} - {fat_caterpillars_leave} = <<{caterpillars_after_hatch}-{fat_caterpillars_leave}={caterpillars_left}>>{caterpillars_left} caterpillars on the tree.
